name: join-teams-meetings-ext
title: Join Teams Meetings
description: List Teams meetings and select one to join
author: dfs

commands.name: find-meetings
commands.title: Find Teams Meetings
commands.description: List Teams meetings and select one to join

preferences.name: meetingsFilePath
preferences.title: Meetings File Path
preferences.description: Path to your meetings CSV file. Use ~ for your home directory. Default works with bundled PowerShell script.

preferences.name: powershellScriptPath
preferences.title: PowerShell Script Path (Optional)
preferences.description: Path to a custom PowerShell script. Leave empty to use the bundled script. Use ~ for your home directory.

preferences.name: powershellFunctionName
preferences.title: PowerShell Function Name (Optional)
preferences.description: Name of the PowerShell function to call. Leave empty to use 'extract-meetings' (bundled script default).
